title: Stuck on authenticating
body:
I just downloaded the game haven't been able to login past the client??? is this problem just my own or is it happening to everyone ?
i have already tried the hex repair tool and nothing. also reinstalled the game.

replies.body:
Getting stuck at authenticating is usually caused by a networking block, so a reinstall wouldn't really fix this.  Instead, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any snags causing this.

You can also download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to q.na1.lol.riotgames.com for about 5 minutes.  This will help us see if your ISP or other issue is contributing to the block.  Remove the first 2 IPs  and let me know what you find.
i have a very reliable connection . something is not right, ive uninstalled and reinstalled game rebooted computer and used the hextech. are you guys repairing or whats going on?
I've been having this issue for close to 3 days now...
